feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:06 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:07 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 06:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
